survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Virtual Travel Planning Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered virtual travel planning assistants to assess satisfaction, identify pain points, and improve service offerings.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered virtual travel planning assistants?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes to allow multiple selections.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of recommendations provided by AI-powered virtual travel planning assistants? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of recommendations provided by AI-powered virtual travel planning assistants? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to provide open-ended feedback for qualitative insights.
